thread.title: Lovebirds Karan Kundrra and Anusha Dandekar will ring in Valentine's Day in America : Celebrity, News - India Today
thread.title_full: Lovebirds Karan Kundrra and Anusha Dandekar will ring in Valentine's Day in America : Celebrity, News - India Today

title: Lovebirds Karan Kundrra and Anusha Dandekar will ring in Valentine's Day in America : Celebrity, News - India Today
text:
Lovebirds Karan Kundrra and Anusha Dandekar will ring in Valentine's Day in America Karan and Anusha are going to celebrate the special day in Los Angeles. IndiaToday.in | Posted by Anvita Singh A + A - Karan Kundrra and Anusha Dandekar. Picture courtesy: Instagram/vjanusha 
Celebrity couple Karan Kundrra and Anusha Dandekar are madly in love with each other. And the world knows this, because they keep posting adorable photographs of each other on various social media sites. 
The duo have been holidaying in the US, and they will celebrate Valentine's Day in Los Angeles. 
"Anusha and I are celebrating Valentine's Day in LA this year," The Times of India quoted the actor as saying. 
Also read: 5 unconventional romantic TV shows you must watch this Valentine's Day 
The good-looking duo, who currently host the reality show MTV Love School, have been dating for quite some time now. 
Karan also confessed that both of them (Anusha and Karan) work hard to keep the romance alive, and that they live each day basking in each other's love. A photo posted by Karan Kundrra (@kkundrra) on Jan 31, 2017 at 8:08pm PST "This may sound cliched but we celebrate every day as if it's Valentine's Day. That's what we tried teaching MTV love school couples as well. You should always keep the spark alive. I love spending time with Anusha and vacationing with her and that's what we are doing right now," Karan told The Times of India.
Happy Valentine's Day, Karan and Anusha! For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
